questions.html: We work with companies to help understand the needs of customers, and to help refine sales and product strategy. You recently met with team members from X. Please help us by taking a few moments to comment on your experience. Please be as forthcoming as you can.
questions.name: intro1

questions.html: Your responses can not be connected back to you individually!
questions.name: intro2
busyesno
questions.title: Did you ultimately decide to do business with X?

choices.text: We'll choose another vendor that better meets our needs
We don't have a need for their solution at this time
We have a need but don't think X can meet it
We have a need but don't have the budget

questions.name: whynobus
questions.title: Which statement(s) apply your decision with respect to X?
